name: Souls Keeper
description:
Souls Keeper is a versus game, mixing card and tower defenses games.

Your goal is to beat the graveyard of your opponent, and defend yours.

This game is actually in pre-alpha stage. It's only a prototype, there isn't the two players game for now, but you can experience it in single player.

Have fun !
Team :

Producer - Game Designer : Nicolas Leal

Game Designer - Lead Programmer : Jérôme Desbordes

Programmer : Guillaume Vautrain

Art Director - 3D Artist : Alice Paraz

3D Artist : Maxime Chevrier

3D Artist - Concept Artist : Emile Chauvin

3D Artist - 2D Artist : Manon Millory
